dct:title: Miami-Dade County Libraries
dct:creator: Miami-Dade Public Library System

The maps/data shown here are for illustration purposes only and are not suitable for site-specific decision making. dct:description: A point feature class of libraries operated/managed by the Miami-Dade County Public Library System.
prov:action:
#########
# GDSC ETL is performed in two steps: shell script to ETL data into postgres
# and then additional transformations with SQL in postGIS (if needed).
####

#########
# Step 1 - bash script (pseudo code)
####

# create directory structure and move into it
mkdir -p /data/mdc_county_library/{download,etl} && cd /data/mdc_county_library

# set update flag based on last update and update frequency
do_update=0 if date() < last_update + update_frequency else do_update = 1

# download if update flag is set:
if do_update == 1 then
  wget -O download/mdc_county_library.json 'https://services.arcgis.com/8Pc9XBTAsYuxx9Ny/arcgis/rest/services/Library_gdb/FeatureServer/0/query?where=1%3D1&outFields=*&outSR=4326&f=json'

# replace column names Shape__Length and Shape__Area to avoid conflict when
# providing as service on ArcServer.
sed -i 's/Shape__Length/shape_length/gI; s/Shape__Area/shape_area/gI' download/mdc_county_library.json

# load into postGIS with:
  ogr2ogr -lco GEOMETRY_NAME=geom -f PostgreSQL PG:"<postgres connection>" download/mdc_county_library.json -nlt point -nln mdc_county_library

#########
# Step 2 - SQL script (pseudo code):
####

# remove duplicate points and make geometries valid:
UPDATE mdc_county_library
  SET geom=ST_MakeValid(ST_RemoveRepeatedPoints(geom));"

# add local geometry column and reproject existing geometries into local EPSG:
SELECT AddGeometryColumn (
  'mdc_county_library',
  'geom_local',2236,'point',2
);
UPDATE mdc_county_library
  SET geom_local=ST_MakeValid(ST_RemoveRepeatedPoints(ST_Transform(geom,2236)));
CREATE INDEX mdc_county_library_geom_local_idx
  ON mdc_county_library
  USING GIST (geom_local);
NOTIFY pgrst, 'reload schema';"cd /data/mdc_county_library/
mkdir -p derived
# Create pg_dump and downloadable zip of table in derivate directory 
pg_dump -d $POSTGRES_DB -U $POSTGRES_USER -p $POSTGRES_PORT -h postgis-zw0vpqotapompcl3 -t mdc_county_library > derived/mdc_county_library.sql
tar -czf derived/mdc_county_library.sql.tar.gz meta_dcat_mdc_county_library.json -C derived mdc_county_library.sql
dcat:contactPoint: University of Miami Libraries, Frost Institute for Data Science and Computing
